name: SMS Support Chatbot powered by Twilio
description: An example of a SMS bot using Twilio's autopilot and Node.js.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID. Get a free account at twilio.com/try-twilio

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at twilio.com/console

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: The Twilio phone number you want to use to send SMS. Get one in the Twilio Console
